isis.stitle: 7.3 Liter Diesel Engine Service (1991) - CYLINDER HEAD AND VALVES - CYLINDER HEAD (Removal & Reassembly) - VALVE LEVER CLEANING AND INSPECTION

svcproc.title: VALVE LEVER CLEANING AND INSPECTION
svcproc.para: Clean all parts with a suitable solvent and use filtered compressed air to dry the parts.

Inspect the valve stem contact surface of each valve lever and replace any valve lever which is deeply pitted. Inspect the valve lever bolts for thread damage, excessive wear or looseness in the cylinder head. Replace as required.
